      • getSportType

        public int getSportType()
        Get sport type. SPORT_RIDE SPORT_OD SPORT_ID SPORT_WALK SPORT_CLIMB SPORT_BB SPORT_SWIM SPORT_BADMINTON SPORT_FOOTBALL SPORT_ELLIPTICAL_TRAINER SPORT_YOGA SPORT_PING_PONG SPORT_ROPE_SKIPPING

      • setSportType

        public void setSportType(int sportType)

      • getDuration

        public int getDuration()
        Get sport duration (unit seconds)

      • setDuration

        public void setDuration(int duration)

      • getDistance

        public float getDistance()
        Get sport distance (unit km)

        If getSportType() is one of SPORT_OD SPORT_ID SPORT_WALK, this data is valid. Other types of sport can ignore this data

      • setDistance

        public void setDistance(float distance)

      • getCalories

        public float getCalories()
        Get calories consumed of this sport (unit kCal)

      • setCalories

        public void setCalories(float calories)

      • getSteps

        public int getSteps()
        Get steps

        If getSportType() is one of SPORT_OD SPORT_ID SPORT_WALK SPORT_CLIMB, this data is valid. Other types of sport can ignore this data

      • setSteps

        public void setSteps(int steps)
